DOC.brief_summary: To study first hypothesis , retrospective cohort analysis Air Force member January 2005 December 2010 perform evaluate association obesity independent predictor variable musculoskeletal disease dependent variable .
DOC.brief_title: Obesity Risk Factor Musculoskeletal Diseases U.S. Air Force : Associations Implications Force Readiness
DOC.detailed_description: To study first hypothesis , retrospective cohort analysis Air Force member January 2005 December 2010 perform evaluate association obesity independent predictor variable musculoskeletal disease dependent variable . A second analysis perform cohort use musculoskeletal disease independent predictor variable , well evaluate potential interaction obesity musculoskeletal disease , determine association variable dependent variable service member readiness duty . The independent variable analysis include : - Age - Sex - BMI - Fitness data ( PIMR : PFT score , weight , height , BMI , abdominal circumference ) - Profile data ( PIMR : Number profile , number profile due musculoskeletal diagnosis , total day duty limitation , total day mobility limitation ) - Total number deployment serve - All new musculoskeletal diagnosis ( see attach abbreviated ICD-9 list ) - Incidence member separation AF - Incidence disability retirement - X-rays - Surgeries ( orthopaedic , general ) - Referrals Orthopaedic Department - Referrals Pain Clinic - New diagnosis diabetes mellitus - Death All data gather SG6H , Healthcare Informatics Division , de-identified . Then de-identified data cod sent Principal Investigator analysis . All informational data set totally de-identified prior release Principle Investigator analyze statistician .
DOC.criteria: Exclusion : Active Duty Air Force member follow condition exclude study : Documented preexist musculoskeletal injury/disease onset obesity Hypothyroidism/Hyperthyroidism Hyperparathyroidism Osteopenia/Osteoporosis Nicotine dependence Alcohol dependence Eating disorder ( anorexia nervosa , bulimia nervosa ) Cancer require chemotherapy radiation therapy Statuspost gastrectomy Statuspost bilateral oophorectomy Crohn 's Disease Ulcerative Colitis Celiac Disease Cushing 's Disease Prior study period , 6 month take proton pump inhibitor , medroxyprogesterone acetate , bisphosphonates , methotrexate , selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor , inhaled/intranasal corticosteroid Prior study period , 1 month take fluoroquinolones , oral intramuscular corticosteroid , oral intramuscular testosterone , leuprolide
